description.value:
Rite of Becoming
Mystic Rite • Level 2

Time: 1 hour
Cost: 3 Gnosis
Requirement: A spiritual locus, thin place, or Umbral threshold

Description

The Rite of Becoming aligns a Garou more closely with the Umbra, easing the strain of crossing between worlds. Through meditation and invocation, the Garou briefly harmonizes their essence with the spirit realm.

This Rite does not grant mastery of the Umbra. It grants clarity.

Effect

When the Gnosis cost is paid, the Rite succeeds automatically.

The next time the Garou uses Umbra Phasing:

  • Entry into the Umbra automatically succeeds
  • Exit from the Umbra automatically succeeds
  • The Garou may remain in the Umbra for up to 1 minute without suffering any penalties or strain normally associated with Umbra Phasing

This effect applies to one complete Umbra transition (entering and exiting) and then ends.

Limitations

This Rite:

  • Does not grant repeated or permanent benefits
  • Does not allow bypassing hostile spiritual barriers
  • Does not protect against spirits, hazards, or combat within the Umbra
  • If the Garou does not use Umbra Phasing before the end of the current Caern Turn, the Rite's effect is lost
  • This Rite cannot be stacked or extended by repeated performances

"For a moment, the worlds agree to let you pass."
